name: SeaTable Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 SeaTable Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the SeaTable API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the SeaTable API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: row

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 作用: The operation being performed | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many rows

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.description: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify the name using an expression.
tableName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name | 作用: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify the name using an expression. | (必填项)

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table ID | 作用: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

fieldsToSend.name: fieldsToSend
fieldsToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
fieldsToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Define Below for Each Column (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

columnsUi.name: columnsUi
columnsUi.description: Add destination column with its value
columnsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns to Send | 作用: Add destination column with its value | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: view_name (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an View Name using an expression

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: convert_link_id (值: None) - Whether the ID of the linked row is returned in the link column (true). Otherwise, it return the name of the linked row (false).
direction (值: None) - The direction of the sort, ascending (asc) or descending (desc)
order_by (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify a Column using an expression
